texts.overview: [color=title]Earthmover[/color] gives you the power to dig [color=title]multiple tiles[/color] ahead of your location with one blast of your mining laser.

texts.specs: Dig [color=title]2 tiles[/color] across the ground Recharges in [color=title]25.0s[/color]

confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Earth Mover[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Jackhammer[/color] skill.
Further upgrades to [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] will increase the [color=title]distance[/color] of each dig and extend the duration of the dig on each tile.

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Jackhammer[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The beginning upgrade to [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] extends the distance of the dig by [color=dim]one tile[/color]. In conjunction, [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] now causes delays [color=title]tile refill[/color] for a brief period of time.
texts.specs: Dig [color=title]3 tiles[/color] across the ground (+1) Recharges in [color=title]20.0s[/color] (-5.0s) Tiles refill [color=title]10%[/color] more slowly

texts.overview: [color=title]Earth Mover[/color]'s last upgrade greatly reduces the skill's total [color=dim]recharge time[/color]. Each tile you dig with [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] will remain unfilled for even longer.
texts.specs: Dig [color=title]3 tiles[/color] into the ground Recharges in [color=title]15.0s[/color] (-5.0s) Tiles refill [color=title]25%[/color] more slowly (+15%)

confirm.footer: Doing so will fully upgrade your [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] skill.

receipt.footer: You have now fully upgraded [color=title]Earth Mover[/color].

texts.overview: You fully upgraded [color=title]Earth Mover[/color], greatly reducing the skill's total [color=dim]recharge time[/color]. Each tile you dig with [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] now remains unfilled for longer than ever before.
